title: Google\Cloud\Security\PrivateCA\V1\CertificateAuthority\KeyVersionSpec
name: KeyVersionSpec
description:
A Cloud KMS key configuration that a [CertificateAuthority][google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateAuthority] will use.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.security.privateca.v1.CertificateAuthority.KeyVersionSpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.cloud_kms_key_version
params.description: The resource name for an existing Cloud KMS CryptoKeyVersion in the format projects/*/locations/*/keyRings/*/cryptoKeys/*/cryptoKeyVersions/*. This option enables full flexibility in the key's capabilities and properties.

params.name: data.algorithm
params.description: The algorithm to use for creating a managed Cloud KMS key for a for a simplified experience. All managed keys will be have their [ProtectionLevel][google.cloud.kms.v1.ProtectionLevel] as HSM.

methods.name: getCloudKmsKeyVersion
methods.description:
The resource name for an existing Cloud KMS CryptoKeyVersion in the format projects/*/locations/*/keyRings/*/cryptoKeys/*/cryptoKeyVersions/*.

This option enables full flexibility in the key's capabilities and properties.
